titleInfo.title: Politische "Grenzgänger" in der Viersektorenstadt Berlin (1945 - 1948) Überlegungen zu einer historischen Quellenkritik der Autobiografie

mods.abstract: The article aims to develop criteria that can be helpful for the historical contextualization of sources which are helpful for autobiographical research. It focuses on "political border-crossers" in Berlin. These people resufsed to accept the separation of East and West and the consequences of the Cold War. They looked - unsuccessfully in the end - for political alternatives to the formation of ideological camps and the separation of states and cities.
